LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.FungusOptionsToolT: Orkoid Fungus spawnrate options/nBase chance to spawn a Pawn when harvested
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.CocoonOptionsToolT: Orkoid Cocoon spawnrate options/nBase chance to spawn a Pawn when harvested
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.SquigToolTip: Controls how often a Squig is spawned when fungus harvested
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.SnotToolTip: Controls how often a Snotling is spawned when fungus harvested
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.GrotToolTip: Controls how often a Grot is spawned when fungus harvested
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.OrkToolTip: Controls how often a Ork is spawned when fungus harvested
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.FungalMedsToolTip: The chance of Speckled Bloodshade, a fungual equivilant to Herbal Medicine, to be found when harvesting orkoid fungus
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.FungalHarvest_Succ: {0} found a newly emerged {1} while harvesting fungus
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.NonOrkoidTamer: Only Orks and Grots can tame {0}'s
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.AllowOrkoidFightyn: Enables the Fightyness need for Orkoids
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.FightynessStatisfi: Number of Hours after a fight before an ork starts getting rowdy again (this will most likely eventually become the value per point of damage done).
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.FightRiskMinorDesc: These boyz are in a getting restless and may start a fight at any time:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.FightRiskMajorDesc: These boyz are getting very restless and may start a major fight at any time:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.FightRiskExtremeDe: These boyz are critically stressed and may start a extremly violent fight at any moment:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Ork.FightRiskDescEndin: Orkz love to fight, it doesnt much matter what, but they get restless if they go too long without some sort of violence.\n\nTo make colonists feel better, you can do things like make them fancy meals, give them more recreation hours per day and nicer recreation objects, place them in beautiful environments, have them drink and smoke, and much more.
